description: Provide window cleaning services for airport group including T-58, Squadron 412, and 0-276
duration_in_months: There was no information regarding the duration of hours/ of work etc.
full_summary:
### Window Cleaning Services for Airport Group
#### Solicitation Number: WS4422565669
#### Publication Date: 2024-02-05
#### Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-19T14:00:00
#### Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-06-01
#### Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal

Purchaser: **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**

### Service Description

We seek a contractor to provide window cleaning services for the Airport Group, including T-58 and Squadron 412, located at 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, Ontario, and 0-276 located at 20 Airbus Private, Ottawa, Ontario. 

The services shall include, but are not limited to:

* Labour and supervision
* Transportation
* Tools and equipment
* Materials

### Optional Site Visit

We recommend that the bidder or a representative visit the work site to familiarize themselves with the location and requirements. A site visit has been scheduled for March 6th, 2024, at 200 Comet Private, starting at 11:00am EST.

To confirm attendance, please contact Caroline Richard by February 29th, 2024, at caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Evaluation

The tender submission will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Bidders are requested to submit their proposals electronically, and the tender closing date is 2024-03-19T14:00:00.

### Key Dates

- Publication date: 2024-02-05
- Tender closing date: 2024-03-19T14:00:00
- Expected contract start date: 2024-06-01
- Site visit date: 2024-03-06T11:00:00

### Contact Information

For further information or clarification, please contact Caroline Richard via email at caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## End of Announcement

Note: Some minor details have been left out, or rephrased to fit the 400-word constraint, but all essential information is maintained. The rewritten text formats follows markdown style for better readability. 

Relevant Practical Use Cases:
This rewritten document is suitable for government departments, procurement authorities or departments of public works. Anyone handling or interested in access procured government tender tips would benefit from the reproducible resource document rewritten. Also, those who seek increase in accuracy in communication
